Title: The new factory performs successfully
Designer: Xie Zhiguang (谢之光)Xie Mulian (谢幕连)He Youzhi (贺友直)
Publisher: Xin meishu chubanshe (新美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Two Soviet experts visit a factory that was set up with Russian help. The large red banner reads: 慶祝新廠成立,感謝蘇聯老大哥 - Celebrate the establishment of the new factory, thanks to the Soviet Union, our elder brother.
